info.title: FeedTheRealm Core Service API

post.description: Upload multiple 3D models with their materials to a specific world. Supports GLB, FBX, OBJ model files and various material formats. Material files are optional.

parameters.description: Unique ID for the first model
parameters.name: models[0].model_id

parameters.description: Unique ID for the second model
parameters.name: models[1].model_id

400.description: Bad request - missing required fields or invalid format

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing JWT token

500.description: Internal server error - failed to save models

post.description: Upload multiple 3D models with their materials to a specific world. Supports GLB, FBX, OBJ model files and various material formats. Material files are optional.

parameters.description: Unique ID for the first model
parameters.name: models[0].model_id

parameters.description: Unique ID for the second model
parameters.name: models[1].model_id

400.description: Bad request - missing required fields or invalid format

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing JWT token

500.description: Internal server error - failed to save models

get.description: Downloads a single 3D model file (GLB) for a specific asset in a world

400.description: Bad request - missing world_id or model_id

404.description: Not found - model file not found for this asset

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

get.description: Retrieves the list of existing categories UUIDs.

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token
Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

get.description: Retrieves the list of existing sprites UUIDs for a given category UUID.

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token
Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

get.description: Downloads an item sprite by its ID.

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

delete.description: Deletes an item sprite by its ID.

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

post.description: Uploads multiple item sprites. Each sprite must have a provided ID.

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

get.description: Downloads the sprite file for a given sprite UUID.

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token
Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

post.description: Request a new verification code to be sent to the user's email

get.description: Retrieves all items metadata (for Unity client initialization)

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

get.description: Retrieves a single item by its ID

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

delete.description: Deletes an item by its ID

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

patch.description: Updates the sprite associated to an item

400.description: Invalid item ID or bad request body

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

patch.description: Updates the name and bio of the session player character

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

get.description: Retrieves the name and bio of the session player character

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of worlds

parameters.description: Filter worlds by name (case-insensitive partial match)
parameters.name: filter

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

post.description: Publishes a new world with the provided information

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

delete.description: Clears all data in the database, this is only meant for testing and development environments

get.description: Retrieves the name and data of the session player world

401.description: Invalid credentials or invalid JWT token

put.description: Updates the data and description of an existing world
